bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: A category of pharmaceuticsl substances used to stimulate therapeutic vomiting. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 10: 瘴氣候，三日以上，氣浮於上，填塞心胸，使頭痛胸滿而悶， 宜以吐藥，吐之必愈 , “The signs of miasmatic qi. After more than three days, the qi rises to the surface and fills the heart and chest causing headaches, a feeling of fullness in the chest and heart-pressure. [In this situation] it is suitable to take emetics . Once it has been vomited [the patient] will be cured”.
